items.name: HyperFlex Gaming Throne 3.0
items.brief: Maximum comfort for long gaming sessions with memory foam cushions and breathable PU leather.
items.details: Built with a steel frame and premium padding, the HyperFlex Gaming Throne ensures durability and support. It features 4D adjustable armrests, a reclining back up to 160째, and smooth-rolling wheels for mobility. Perfect for both gaming and office use.

items.name: ZenithX Ultimate Gaming Seat 4.0
items.brief: Designed for pro gamers with ergonomic design and high-density cold-cure foam.
items.details: The ZenithX features a reinforced metal base, heavy-duty casters, and high-density foam padding. Its breathable mesh and leather hybrid keeps you cool during marathon gaming. Includes detachable headrest and lumbar pillows.

items.name: EvoMotion Gaming Cruiser 2.0
items.brief: Reclining mechanism and rocker function built for dynamic gamers.
items.details: This chair comes with an extendable footrest, 4D armrests, and a tilt lock system for customized comfort. Upholstered with scratch-resistant PU leather, it withstands daily use while keeping a sleek look.

items.name: NovaCore Elite Gaming Throne 1.0
items.brief: Premium build and 165째 recline for competitive gamers.
items.details: Equipped with cold foam cushioning, heavy-duty frame, and full 165째 recline, the NovaCore Elite is designed for extended gaming. Includes adjustable head and lumbar support to reduce fatigue.

items.name: SpectraGlide Pro Gaming Chair
items.brief: Luxury wide seat base with ergonomic shaping.
items.details: Featuring precision stitching, premium leather, and robust steel construction, this chair provides maximum stability. Adjustable recline and rocking function add versatility for work and play.

items.name: TitanStrike Gaming Fortress
items.brief: Extra-wide seat with industrial-grade steel reinforcement.
items.details: With industrial-grade steel reinforcement, extra-wide seat, and breathable leather, this chair is built for heavy use. Comes with 4D armrests, a 170째 recline, and smooth-rolling wheels for mobility.

items.name: CyberWave Gaming Throne
items.details: Designed for competitive and casual gamers, the CyberWave offers breathable fabric panels, strong recline adjustment, and noise-free casters. Includes removable pillows for personalized comfort.

items.name: QuantumForce X Gaming Pod
items.brief: Futuristic gaming chair with integrated RGB lighting.
items.details: Packed with premium features: integrated RGB lighting, USB charging ports, high-density cold foam, and adjustable recline. The QuantumForce is built for gamers who demand performance and flair.
